review:
I am. Very elderly women working and developed osteoporosis fracture radius and worried abut the surgery but Dr navaladi Shankar was so kind enough and gave the confidence that there are new implants specifically available for the week bone treatment  and with his support I underwent surgery of my wrist and all the procedure went on smooth
Now one month post operations I am normal and regain the confidences and able to do my own work
I really thank the Dr navaladi Shankar for his excellent work in treating my fracture wrist to near perfect normal
I also thank God and bless him

As a doctor he is just comparable with God which can't be seen but can be realize . Here physically everything achievable . So far my view Dr.Sankar Sir is excellent splendid and so other relevant adjectives over his service. I'm too much fortunate to meet such type of worthy human.

Doctor is very kind and updated wit the latest techniques
I am very happy that I am walking pain free after the replacement surgery of the joints 
It gives me great confidence now 
Benefit of the surgery is really good
Apollo hospitals has a great hospita!ity

My father is 70 years old. He is having hip pain. We admitted him in Apollo. This doctor did traction. But he never meet my dad when he is  hospitalised. During review also he didn't see my dad and gave feedback to me.

I strongly recommend this doctor to undergo some soft skill training and learn how to have human connect 
As second opinion I came to know that  surgery itself is not needed

***** *** ****** * after first operations worng in wb ,i go to Chennai applo he operated my right leg 2 times *** ****** * **** ***** * ***** * * **** ** ******** * **** ** *******  * ** *** ***** **** ********* * in 3rd time when i go for checkup he say 65% helling completed and say for walking with  walker support and for rest helling 3month more required but after 4 month again my leg was broken *** **** ******* ******** ******* ** **** **** ******  *** *** ******* *** ********* ***** ********** **** ********

The doctor had gone to the OT, he was late and was busy with his relatives or friends who had come to visit him. I was told that 8:30 appoint patients are still waiting so since i am 11:30 appoint i have to necessarily wait. when i said its emergency i was told even accident patients are waiting so no excuse.On top of it i had to get a file No and fill the forms wherein i was not even able to move my right arm.
Appoint got from practo was not updated in their system. very very pathetic system.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is a wizard, than a surgeon.  Totally satisfied by his work.  12 years past he did surgery to my father and he never had any issue after that.

context: Childhood bone and soft tissue tumors,Lower Back Pain,
review: Good experience with the doctor.and the doctor will see me every time so kindly and so softly.and the treetment of the doctor is very good so Apollo is a very good hospital.
Everything went on smooth I had been afraid of the spine surgery but Dr navaladi gave me confidence and he did my spine surgery now I am 100% alright thanks to his team

Doctor was courteous and assured
My fracture was fixed by latest cutting edge technologies from Apollo greams road chennai by Dr navaladi Shankar senior consultant
My recovery was very fast and will recommend Dr navaladi for everyone
